text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Why!? Spe-chan, why!?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: I've been looking forward to this for so long! To being able to seriously face Spe-chan today!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Since we weren't able to run together this whole time, I was looking forward to it……

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Even then, what the heck was that run!?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: If you don't feel like running, then don't enter a race!
The first race of autumn, the 『Kyoto Daishoten』, ended with Special Week's worst record so far, 7th place.
It was a completely different run from what I had seen so far―― it was almost like she had lost her reason to run.
The shock of losing to Grass Wonder being the sole reason doesn't make sense. While I was thinking about why her mental state would be so poor――
(Riiiiiiing Riiiiiiing)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: 『Hello, Trainer-san……？』

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry for calling you so late at night……
『Night……? Ah, over there it's late, huh. Over here it's just past noon.』
『Night……? Ah, over there it's late, huh. Over here it's just past noon.』

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah…… there's a time difference. I still can't get used to it.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Anyways, um…… I saw Spe-chan's race.
The results of the 『Kyoto Daishoten』 were probably on her mind, to the point where she'd call even when it was late over there.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: 『Spe-chan running while looking so lost, that's the first time I've seen that』
Me too. There were also times during training where it seemed like she couldn't focus, I want to help her but――
Me too. There were also times during training where it seemed like she couldn't focus, I want to help her but――
I couldn't figure out why she was so depressed…… Silence Suzuka remained silent and listened while I told her the situation.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ……Me too, I've had lots of times where I was lost like that. Times where I couldn't run like I wanted, times I couldn't get the results expected of me……

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But, whenever that happened Trainer-san's straight-forward words were what supported me and kept me moving forward.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: 『It's probably unfitting for a Trainer to say this, but forget about victory and just run as you desire』…… I remember being saved by those words.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: That's why, before you're lost too, Trainer-san, please go tell Spe-chan your honest thoughts.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san is always thinking about us before anything else. That's something we understand better than anyone else.
My…… honest thoughts. The words I need to tell Special Week――
My…… honest thoughts. The words I need to tell Special Week――
What kind of Uma Musume do I want to see Special Week become?
What kind of Uma Musume do I want to see Special Week become?
She's always overflowing with liveliness――
When it comes to running, she's genuine and earnest――
She's always straight-forwardly chasing her dreams――

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: "Japan's #1"……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", and then what……?
……I see, so that's what it is……
I still don't know why she's started feeling that way. But, the words Special Week said――
I didn't realize it at the time but, it may have continued on just like this……
"Become Japan's #1 Uma Musume, and then what, is there any meaning in that?"――

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: 『Um……Trainer-san……?』
Sorry, Suzuka! I need to hang up!
choice_data_list: I'm heading over to where Spe is!
I'm heading over to where Spe is!

text_block_list.text: Sorry, Suzuka! I need to hang up!
choice_data_list: I'm heading over to where Spe is!
I'm heading over to where Spe is!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: 『……Okay, take care of Spe-chan』
Normally, lots of Uma Musume would be working hard at training right now but, it was heavily raining on the course, so there weren't many there today.
The course was dead quiet―― she wasn't running, she was just standing there at one end.
Spe……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……？
By the looks of it, you haven't run at all yet, huh? But, well, the course is in pretty bad condition.
Spe's Dream…… becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is pretty hard, huh?
Spe's Dream…… becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is pretty hard, huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah, it's hard. It's so far away, almost like a mirage……but I don't know anymore……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: At the 『Spring Tenno Sho』 seeing everyone's smiling faces, thinking that beyond that was the "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" goal that I was aiming for.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But it was just a feeling, that making a lot of people happy and smiling, that becoming that kind of Uma Musume might be it……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But, I didn't have anywhere near enough strength to become "Japan's #1"……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: On top of that, even if I did eventually become "Japan's #1"……

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: I guess #1 in Japan is only to this level.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: After the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, the reaction to "Japan's #1" was disappointment……and resignation.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That "Japan's #1" could only make it so far…… those words of resignation.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm still so far away from becoming #1 in Japan, what was I thinking……I tried not thinking about it and working hard, I tried but――

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I still end up thinking it…… Becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", what meaning is there in that?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……Everything I've done up until now, was there any meaning in it? Running from now on, will there be any meaning in that either……?
Her own defeats, giving up on her overseas challenge, and then her friend's narrow defeat――
With so many things happening back-to-back, even though she was chasing her dream, her feelings led to her becoming lost. In that case――
When I first met that Uma Musume, I thought she seemed really unreliable.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh……？
But, at the same time, I thought she was someone who I could have high expectations for.
She had just come from Hokkaido, and she wasn't used to races yet――
But, she was always chasing her dreams with all she had. Just watching her raised even my spirits.
Almost like the protagonist of a story. Without losing hope, she would overcome any hardship and move forward, and before I knew it, I was drawn in……
……Spe, just a little while ago you asked if there was any meaning in what you've done, but――
What you've done is, you've given me this much spirit, these hopes, and these dreams.
What you've done is, you've given me this much spirit, these hopes, and these dreams.
I want to keep watching over you and your dream…… now, and always. To me, you're "Japan's #1" that I want to see their dream together with, that's the kind of Uma Musume you are.
I want to keep watching over you and your dream…… now, and always. To me, you're "Japan's #1" that I want to see their dream together with, that's the kind of Uma Musume you are.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: "Japan's #1" that you want to see their dream together with……
"Japan's #1"―― those words came out unconsciously. But those words seemed strangely fitting.
That's right……there's not only one meaning, Spe.
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume", there's not only one correct meaning, there's probably as many meanings as people watching you, Spe.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: As many meanings as people watching me……
And because there is no correct answer, it can keep transforming.
For example, that feeling of resignation for "Japan's #1" that Spe saw――

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: I guess #1 in Japan is only to this level.
Winning against the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume, that kind of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume". Spe, depending on your efforts, it can change to that!
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" has many forms to it, there was meaning to it, everything you did had a proper meaning to it――
Spe can become any of those forms of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
Spe can become any of those forms of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……any form of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"…… ……Ah.

text_block_list.name: Young Spe
text_block_list.text: What kind of Uma Musume is "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Mom
text_block_list.text: Well, let's see……maybe an Uma Musume that runs with everything they've got, and is still energetic even after crossing the goal.

text_block_list.name: Young Spe
text_block_list.text: Is that really "Japan's #1"……?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Mom
text_block_list.text: Yeah, at least that's what Mom thinks!

text_block_list.name: Spe's Mom
text_block_list.text: But, don't you think there's a lot more? Types of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", I mean.

text_block_list.name: Young Spe
text_block_list.text: Like what?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Mom
text_block_list.text: Hmm, let's see, like maybe the most famous in Japan――

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……That's right, my mom said that. To my mom, "Japan's #1" meant……
Among the people watching Spe, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" can mean many things. To me, Spe is "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" that I want to see their dream together with.
Among the people watching Spe, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" can mean many things. To me, Spe is "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" that I want to see their dream together with.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……!
Special Week looked at me with wide eyes.
Those eyes seemed teary, but they also seemed to be filled with fire――
『Fall Tenno Sho』, 『Japan Cup』, and 『Arima Kinen』, and anything that comes after, I want to see all of those dreams together with Spe……!
That's why, I want to keep seeing that dream together, and make everyone in Japan……no, everyone in the world know that name. To everyone, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"――
That's why, I want to keep seeing that dream together, and make everyone in Japan……no, everyone in the world know that name. To everyone, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"――

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……! Yeah!! I'll keep running, and then――

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'll aim to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" for everyone!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, hey, are ya plannin' on runnin' in all this mud?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Fufuu……if you'd like, how about letting us join in?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice will chase after Spe-san, okay……!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Let's do our best, Spe-chan!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: E-everyone……!?
Alright, let's start training! Run your heart out, Spe!
Alright, let's start training! Run your heart out, Spe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'll be off!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: It's finally here, Autumn's biggest, the 『Fall Tenno Sho』! This year there are a lot of big names too!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: With two Classic crowns, Seiun Sky, and someone who fought hard alongside her, King Halo!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Fighting her way up through several veterans to make it this far, Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi, and trying to put a stop to the "Golden Generation", Mejiro Bright!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: And finally, the one who conquered the 『Spring Tenno Sho』, Special Week, attempting to obtain both the Spring and Fall consecutively!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: A once in a century battle between Japan's most accomplished competitors! Which Uma Musume will stand at the top!?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, Tsuru-chan……!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……I'm sorry about last time. It can't be helped that Tsuru-chan was mad after I ran like that.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But today, I'm fine. I promise I definitely won't disappoint you with that kind of run this time.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: ……Ehehe, those eyes. Those are the eyes of the Derby Uma Musume, the one I've wanted to battle the most in Japan, the Spe-chan I've been chasing.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: I'm looking forward to it! Let's give it everything we've got!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'll do my best, and give it my all!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: And now they've reached the straight! On the inside, King Halo pushes through! Taking the outside, Seiun Sky moves forward!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: But from even further outside comes Special Week! Special Week chases, surging forward!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Daaaaaaa～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Special Week! Special Week! Special Week, at the end takes the lead and 1st place!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Special Week is truly strong! She splendidly obtains consecutive wins in the Spring and Fall 『Tenno Sho』!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: With a winning time of 1 minute and 58 seconds! Victory with a record time! In a stunning comeback from the last race, she successfully turns it around!
